comments: Create a triangle with T(n,1)=L(n-1) for L a Lucas number and the other side T(n,n)=L(2*(n-1)).  Interior elements are defined as T(r,c)=T(r-1,c-1)+T(r-1,c).  Half the sum of the terms in row(n)=a(n) for n=1,2,3...- _J. M. Bergot_, Dec 15 2012
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-3,-2,1).
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Corrected by Franklin T. Adams-Watters, Oct 25 2006
